posts.message: Netsparker can scan for lots of web security vulnerabilities, this free version of Netsparker is a great SQL injection scanner. It can scan and exploit SQL Injection vulnerabilities in different back-end databases with really high accuracy and without any false-positives. Netsparker is the best SQL Injection Scanner among the all commercial, free and open source web vulnerability scanner according to 3rd party benchmark by finding 98.53% of all SQL Injections in tests
